meanings.definition: A person who cheats at card games.
meanings.sent1: The cardsharper was caught trying to cheat during the poker game.
meanings.sent2: Be careful when playing with that cardsharper, he always finds a way to win.
meanings.sent3: The cardsharper's attempt to sneak extra cards into the game was quickly discovered.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a cardsharper spread throughout the town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The cardsharper's sly smile gave away his intentions to cheat.

meanings.sent1: He tried to cardsharper his way to victory by hiding extra aces up his sleeve.
meanings.sent2: She would often cardsharper during friendly card games to ensure she won.
meanings.sent3: The kids thought it was funny when their dad tried to cardsharper his way out of losing.
meanings.sent4: His ability to cardsharper was unmatched, leaving his opponents frustrated.
meanings.sent5: The magician seemed to cardsharper effortlessly, leaving the audience in awe.
